com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class Form

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.Form
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, ComponentCallbacks2, KeyEvent.Callback, LayoutInflater.Factory, LayoutInflater.Factory2, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, Window.Callback, Component, ComponentContainer, HandlesEventDispatching
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReplForm

    public class Form
extends Activity
implements Component, ComponentContainer, HandlesEventDispatching
    Component underlying activities and UI apps, not directly accessible to Simple programmers.

    This is the root container of any Android activity and also the superclass for for Simple/Android UI applications. The main form is always named "Screen1".

      • $define

        protected void $define()
        Compiler-generated method to initialize and add application components to the form. We just provide an implementation here to artificially make this class concrete so that it is included in the documentation and Codeblocks language definition file generated by DocumentationGenerator and LangDefXmlGenerator, respectively. The actual implementation appears in runtime.scm.

      • ScreenOrientation

        public String ScreenOrientation()
        The requested screen orientation. Commonly used values are unspecified (-1), landscape (0), portrait (1), sensor (4), and user (2). " + "See the Android developer documentation for ActivityInfo.Screen_Orientation for the " + "complete list of possible settings. ScreenOrientation property getter method.
        Returns:
        screen orientation

      • ScreenOrientation

        public void ScreenOrientation(String screenOrientation)
        ScreenOrientation property setter method: sets the screen orientation for the form.
        Parameters:
        screenOrientation - the screen orientation as a string

      • AlignHorizontal

        public int AlignHorizontal()
        Returns a number that encodes how contents of the screen are aligned horizontally. The choices are: 1 = left aligned, 2 = horizontally centered, 3 = right aligned

      • AlignHorizontal

        public void AlignHorizontal(int alignment)
        Sets the horizontal alignment for contents of the screen
        Parameters:
        alignment -

      • AlignVertical

        public int AlignVertical()
        Returns a number that encodes how contents of the arrangement are aligned vertically. The choices are: 1 = top, 2 = vertically centered, 3 = aligned at the bottom. Vertical alignment has no effect if the screen is scrollable.

      • AlignVertical

        public void AlignVertical(int alignment)
        Sets the vertical alignment for contents of the screen
        Parameters:
        alignment -

      • $add

        public void $add(AndroidViewComponent component)
        Description copied from interface: ComponentContainer
        Adds a component to a container.

        After this method is finished executing, the given component's view must have LayoutParams, even if the component cannot be added to the container until later.

        Specified by:
        $add in interface ComponentContainer
        Parameters:
        component - component associated with view

      • fullScreenVideoAction

        public Bundle fullScreenVideoAction(int action,
                           VideoPlayer source,
                           Object data)
        Perform some action related to fullscreen video display.
        Parameters:
        action - Can be any of the following:
        • FullScreenVideoUtil.FULLSCREEN_VIDEO_ACTION_DURATION
        • FullScreenVideoUtil.FULLSCREEN_VIDEO_ACTION_FULLSCREEN
        • FullScreenVideoUtil.FULLSCREEN_VIDEO_ACTION_PAUSE

        source - The VideoPlayer to use in some actions.
        data - Used by the method. This object varies depending on the action.
        Returns:
        Varies depending on what action was passed in.
